articles.title: Factbox: Alberta wildfire shuts in at least 145000 boepd of Canadian output - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main oil-producing province Alberta on Saturday declared a provincial state of emergency due to wildfires, shutting in at least 145,000 of oil eq…
articles.content:
May 8 (Reuters) - Canada's main oil-producing province Alberta on Saturday declared a provincial state of emergency due to wildfires, shutting in at least 145,000 of oil equivalent per day (boepd).
… [+2087 chars]
